title: Heat transfer when hot Fe is added to water

content.prompt: A 50.0 g sample of Fe at 100°C is added to 500.0 mL of water at 35°C in a perfectly insulated container. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The temperature of the water will decrease.
The temperature change of the Fe will have the same magnitude as the temperature change of the water.
The heat energy lost by the Fe will be less than the heat energy gained by the water.
The heat energy lost by the Fe will be equal to the heat energy gained by the water.

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
